title: Mobile Marketing
alt: We're firing you, but the online headline-writing division wants to hire you.
transcript:
[Black Hat sits at a desk. A voice speaks from off panel, in front of Black Hat.]
Off Panel Voice: CNN hired you to improve viewership.[Black Hat continues sitting at the desk.]
Black Hat: ...yes, and?[Next panel, conversation continues.]
Off Panel Voice: You texted "Holy crap, turn on the news" to a million random phone numbers?
Black Hat: It sure did work.
Off Panel Voice: Not what we meant!
